Pre-Game Insights: AFC highlighted the match between Indonesia and Vietnam as one of the most interesting in the tournament.
AFC praised Vietnam for their impressive performance despite losing 4-2 to Japan in their first match.
AFC noted that Indonesia, coached by Shin Tae Yong, took positives from their 3-1 loss to Iraq.
The match is crucial as a second consecutive loss for either team would significantly reduce their chances of advancing to the knockout stage.
Indonesia is considered the underdog based on recent head-to-head records, with their last victory over Vietnam occurring in 2016 and their last goal against Vietnam at the senior level in 2019.
